Package edu.ntnu.idatt2106_09.backend.service.category

Interface CategoryService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CategoryServiceImplementation
@Service public interface CategoryService
Interface defining methods for interacting with Category objects. It provides methods for retrieving, updating, and deleting categories, as well as operations involving the conversion between Category and CategoryDto objects. Implementations of this interface should handle the necessary logic for fetching data from repositories and mapping between different object representations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CategoryDto>
    deleteCategory(Long categoryId)
    Deletes a category with the provided categoryId.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<CategoryDto>>
    getAllCategories()
    Retrieves all the categories available and returns them as a set of CategoryDto objects wrapped in a ResponseEntity.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CategoryDto>
    getCategoryById(Long categoryId)
    Retrieves a category by its ID and returns the category as a CategoryDto object wrapped in a ResponseEntity.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CategoryDto>
    updateCategory(Long categoryId, CategoryDto updatedCategoryDto)
    Updates a category with the provided categoryId using the information from the updatedCategoryDto object.

  • Method Details

    • getAllCategories

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<CategoryDto>> getAllCategories()
      Retrieves all the categories available and returns them as a set of CategoryDto objects wrapped in a ResponseEntity.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a set of CategoryDto objects representing all the categories available. If the set is empty, the HTTP status is set to NO_CONTENT, otherwise, the HTTP status is set to OK.

    • getCategoryById

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CategoryDto> getCategoryById(Long categoryId)
      Retrieves a category by its ID and returns the category as a CategoryDto object wrapped in a ResponseEntity.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a CategoryDto object representing the requested category. If the category is found, the HTTP status is set to OK.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the category with the given ID is not found.

    • updateCategory

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CategoryDto> updateCategory(Long categoryId, CategoryDto updatedCategoryDto)
      Updates a category with the provided categoryId using the information from the updatedCategoryDto object. The method only updates the fields that are not null in the updatedCategoryDto.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to be updated.
      updatedCategoryDto - A CategoryDto object containing the updated information for the category.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity with the appropriate HTTP status. If the category is updated successfully, the HTTP status is set to OK. If the category with the given ID is not found, the HTTP status is set to NOT_FOUND.

    • deleteCategory

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CategoryDto> deleteCategory(Long categoryId)
      Deletes a category with the provided categoryId.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity with the appropriate HTTP status. If the category is deleted successfully, the HTTP status is set to OK. If the category with the given ID is not found, the HTTP status is set to NOT_FOUND.
